p: Present-day meteorology is downscaled in WRF from NARR for 2011 conditions, as described in Harkey and Holloway [ 71]. The NARR model assimilates measured meteorological data to produce a gridded, continuous dataset [ 75]. We focus on July 2011 as representative of peak summertime electricity demand and the summer high O 3 season, and consistent with the latest NEI at the time of modeling.
